text: Golden Girl is a 1951 American musical movie directed by Lloyd Bacon and starring Mitzi Gaynor, Dale Robertson, Dennis Day, Una Merkel. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1952. ==Other websites== * * Category:1951 musical movies Category:1950s American musical movies Category:Movies directed by Lloyd Bacon
title: Golden Girl (1951 movie)
